roleset.name: annoy, causing bother, bothered by something
roleset.note: ANNOY-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, force-59-1 (from annoy.01-v)
ANNOYING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, annoy-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls amuse-31.1, force-59-1. (from annoying.01-j)
ANNOYED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, annoy-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1, force-59-1. (from annoyed.01-j)

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: That response annoyed Rep. Markey, House aides said, and the congressman snapped back that there had been enough studies of the issue and that it was time for action on the matter.

example.name: passive with sentential 'agent'
example.text: The 79-year-old Mississippian takes a more orthodox, entrenched view of agriculture policy than those in the movement to reduce chemical use, but as a master of pork-barrel politics, [he]-1 is believed to be annoyed *trace*-1 as well that the project moved to Arkansas from a Tennessee center near Memphis and the northern Mississippi border.
example.arg: that the project moved to Arkansas from a Tennessee center near Memphis and the northern Mississippi border

example.name: with instrument. There's a fish in the percolator
example.text: John annoyed Mary by straining her coffee through his dirty socks.
example.arg: by straining her coffee through his dirty socks

example.name: both args, concatenation
example.text: To me, he was annoying to play against.

example.name: TMP, EXT, arg1
example.text: None , when I was in Cyprus the heat was too annoying , so I 'd rather not reside in that region .

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Daniel Smith as Mike was annoying with his wrestling antics;

example.name: explosive anger
example.text: The New Mexico teenager accused of fatally shooting his parents and three younger siblings told authorities he was annoyed with his mother.

example.name: all args, CAU
example.text: I was annoyed at her for flaking on me seeing as she was not even that hot
example.arg: seeing as she was not even that hot
